summary: Based on the works by Brandon Sanderson, this mod adds several new spells, a race with new mechanics, a new dagger, 2 compnaions, a new house and a fun way to RP as a character in the Mistborn world!
descriptionHtml:
The location of the house is in the pictures

Alrighty then! after a hiatus I\'m back. 

The mod had a revamp and so I\'m updating this page. (finally) 

All of the basic allomantic metals have been added, 2 new followers, the new race, a new weapon, and a new house. 

The race: Mistborn: No magicka regen (drink potions like the metal vials), skilled with magic, alchemy, sneak and one handed. 

The weapon: A black glass dagger for mistborn, also 1 companion has a new warhammer fitting for a Thug. 

Spells: Steel- shoots a coin 
Iron - pulls objects 
Tin- enhances vision 
Pewter - greater strength 
(no bronze, couldn\'t find a way to implement it that made it useful) 
Copper - Invis. 
Zinc - a strong fury 
Brass - a strong calm 

Followers- Found in the winking skeever at solitude. 
Throg - Thug/pewterarm. Weilds a warhammer and uses pewter 
Jak - Coinshot/steel burner. Will stand back shooting coins, and charge in with a dagger, 

New house: West of dawnstar is a new house, inside is some basic armor to help a new mistborn along. It is safe to store items inside, as it does not reset. Some potions and an alchemy table are inside. 

To get the spells, head to embershard mine and kill the rogue mistborn located inside, he will drop daggers and spells. 

MinisterTanner helped with the companions.
author: DoopSlayer
